content.webTitle: Hamstring keeps Linderoth out of training session

fields.headline: Hamstring keeps Linderoth out of training session
fields.bodyText: The defensive midfielder Tobias Linderoth missed Sweden's training session yesterday with a pulled hamstring. "We left Linderoth in the hotel just as a precaution because the tournament is getting closer and we want to be at full strength when it starts," said Lars Lagerback, the coach of England's final group opponents. Sweden play Trinidad & Tobago on Saturday and Lagerback added: "We always said it is going to be a tight race between England, Paraguay and Sweden for the top two spots. I think Trinidad & Tobago are the group's underdogs."
